Class JulianEpoch

java.lang.Object
io.github.ethanlamtt.vietchrono.astro.JulianEpoch
public final class JulianEpoch extends Object
Represents a Julian epoch defined by a reference JulianDay in specific TimeScale.

This class is immutable and thread-safe

.
Since:
1.0.0

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this Julian Epoch with the specified object for equality.

      Two JulianDay instances are considered equal if their reference JulianDay are equal

      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to be compared.
      Returns:
      true if the two objects are equal; otherwise false.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code of this object. The hash code value is based on the hash code value of its reference JulianDay.
